'''One-Eyed Pim''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

One-Eyed Pim is the maimed version of [Two-Eyed Pim](/twoEyedPim/). He will only be seen at the end of the game in the [Grand Promenade](/grandPromenade/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =If the Príncipi are the greatest rival at the end of the game and Pim is their leader, he will confront the Watcher at Ukaizo.
}}

'''One-Eyed Pim''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
One-Eyed Pim is the maimed version of [[Two-Eyed Pim]]. He will only be seen at the end of the game in the [[Grand Promenade]].
